special_text:
Cathexis, Soul Aspect enters with an additional loyalty counter on it for each unique name among other permanents you control.
[-1]: You may sacrifice a permanent. If you do, create a 5/5 Wonder Archon creature token that's all colors. If you don't, create two 1/1 Wonder creature tokens that are all colors.
[-4]: Draw a card for each permanent you control that's all colors.
